properties.entry: SELECT HABIT_ID , HABIT_NAME , HABIT_TYPE , HABIT_DAYS , HABIT_GOAL FROM HBT_REGISTER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY') FROM DUAL WHERE HABIT_DAYS LIKE '%'|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY')||'%')
SELECT USER_ID , HABIT_ID , HABIT_NAME , HABIT_TYPE , HABIT_GOAL , HABIT_DAYS FROM HBT_REGISTER WHERE HABIT_ID = ?
SELECT HABIT_ID , DO_DATE FROM HBT_CHECK WHERE HABIT_ID = ? AND DO_DATE = ?
UPDATE HBT_CHECK SET COUNT_CHECK = ? WHERE HABIT_ID = ? AND DO_DATE = ?
SELECT user_id FROM hbt_user WHERE user_name = ? AND user_pwd = ?
SELECT user_name FROM hbt_user WHERE user_name = ?
SELECT user_name , user_pwd , user_email , user_pin FROM hbt_user WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE HBT_TIMER SET TIME_RECORD = ? WHERE HABIT_ID = ? AND DO_DATE = ?
SELECT HABIT_ID , DO_DATE FROM HBT_TIMER WHERE HABIT_ID = ? AND DO_DATE = ?
UPDATE hbt_user SET user_name = ? , user_pwd = ? , user_email = ? WHERE user_id = ?
INSERT INTO HABBITADD ( MEMBER_ID , HABIT_TYPE , HABIT_DATE , HABIT_SELECTDAY , HABIT_RECORD , HABIT_RECORD_NEXT ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) , SUM(COUNT_CHECK) FROM HBT_CHECK WHERE SUBSTR(DO_DATE,4,2) = ? AND HABIT_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) , SUM(TIME_RECORD) FROM HBT_TIMER WHERE SUBSTR(DO_DATE,4,2) = ? AND HABIT_ID = ?
